info.name: üöÄ Incubation Management System - COMPREHENSIVE ROLE-BASED API Collection
info.description:
Complete, production-ready Postman collection organized by user roles with all profile management endpoints. Each folder contains endpoints accessible to that specific role, making it easy to test role-based access control.

**NEW FEATURES INCLUDED:**
- Complete Profile Management endpoints (Phase 1-5)
- Profile completion tracking
- Extended profile views
- Role-based organization for easy testing

variable.description: Base URL for API endpoints - Change to your deployed URL
JWT token automatically set after login

item.name: üîê AUTHENTICATION - START HERE
item.description: Login with different user roles to test role-based access control. Tokens are automatically saved for subsequent requests.

request.description:
**Director Role**: Full system access
- View all teams, projects, reports
- Manage mentors and announcements
- Access comprehensive analytics
- Create and manage users

**Test Account**: director@university.edu / director123

exec: pm.test("Token saved for future requests", function () {

request.description:
**Manager Role**: Operational management
- Manage assigned teams (CRUD)
- Approve/decline material requests
- Send notifications to teams
- Manage inventory and generate reports

**Test Account**: manager@university.edu / manager123

**Incubator Role**: Team-focused operations
- Manage team members and projects
- Request materials from managers
- View announcements and notifications
- Communicate with mentors
- Complete profile in phases

**Test Account**: innovatex@teams.com / team123

**Mentor Role**: Team-specific guidance
- View assigned teams and projects
- Monitor team progress
- Communicate with assigned teams
- Access team-specific analytics

**Test Account**: mentor@university.edu / mentor123

Get current authenticated user information

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "user": {
    "id": "c...",
    "name": "Director Name",
    "email": "director@university.edu",
    "role": "director"
  }
}
```

Logout current user and invalidate session

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Logged out successfully"
}
```

item.name: üë§ ALL ROLES - PROFILE MANAGEMENT
item.description: Profile management endpoints accessible to all authenticated users (Director, Manager, Mentor, Incubator). These endpoints support the phased profile completion system.

request.description:
Get complete user profile with all fields including new profile phases

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Response includes:**
- Phase 1: Basic Information (first_name, last_name, phone, profile_photo_url)
- Phase 2: Academic Profile (enrollment_status, major_program, graduation_year)
- Phase 3: Professional Profile (current_role, skills, support_interests)
- Phase 5: Additional Information (additional_notes)
- Profile completion tracking

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "c...",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "phone": "+250123456789",
    "enrollment_status": "CurrentlyEnrolled",
    "major_program": "Computer Science",
    "skills": ["Coding/Development", "UX/UI Design"],
    "profile_completion_percentage": 75
  }
}
```

Get specific phase data (1-5)

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Phase Numbers:**
- 1: Essential Information (Basic Info)
- 2: Academic Profile
- 3: Professional Profile
- 4: Project Information
- 5: Additional Information

**Response Example (Phase 1):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "phone": "+250123456789",
    "profile_photo_url": "https://...",
    "completed": true
  },
  "phase": 1
}
```

Update Phase 1: Essential Information

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Required Fields:**
- first_name (2-50 chars)
- last_name (2-50 chars)
- phone (international format, e.g., +250123456789)

**Optional Fields:**
- middle_name (1-50 chars)
- profile_photo_url (valid URL)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile Phase 1 updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "c...",
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "phone": "+250123456789"
  }
}
```

Update Phase 2: Academic Profile

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Required Fields:**
- enrollment_status (enum: CurrentlyEnrolled, Graduated, OnLeave, Other)
- major_program (2-100 chars)
- program_of_study (2-100 chars)
- graduation_year (number, 1900 to current year + 10)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile Phase 2 updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "enrollment_status": "CurrentlyEnrolled",
    "major_program": "Computer Science",
    "graduation_year": 2025
  }
}
```

Update Phase 3: Professional Profile

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Required Fields:**
- current_role (enum: ProjectLead, Employee, FounderCoFounder, AttendsWorkshopsOnly, Other)
- skills (array of strings, minimum 1)
- support_interests (array of strings, minimum 1)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile Phase 3 updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "current_role": "ProjectLead",
    "skills": ["Coding/Development", "UX/UI Design"],
    "support_interests": ["Mentorship", "Funding"]
  }
}
```

Update Phase 5: Additional Information (Optional)

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Optional Fields:**
- additional_notes (max 5000 chars)

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile Phase 5 updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "additional_notes": "I'm passionate about..."
  }
}
```

Upload or update profile photo URL

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Required Fields:**
- profile_photo_url (valid URL, max 500 chars)

**Note**: You need to upload the image file first using a file upload service, then provide the URL here.

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Profile photo updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "profile_photo_url": "https://example.com/uploads/profile-photo.jpg"
  }
}
```

Get basic user profile (legacy endpoint)

**Access**: All authenticated users

**Response Example:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "c...",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "user@example.com",
    "role": "incubator"
  }
}
```

Update basic profile information (legacy endpoint)

**Access**: All authenticated users

item.name: üéØ DIRECTOR - FULL SYSTEM ACCESS
item.description: Complete access to all system features and data. Directors can manage users, view all reports, and have full administrative control.

request.description:
Get all users in the system

**Access**: Director only

**Query Parameters:**
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- limit: Items per page (default: 10)
- role: Filter by role (director, manager, mentor, incubator, all)
- search: Search by name or email

Create a new user account

**Access**: Director only

**Note**: If password is not provided, a default password will be auto-generated based on role and sent via email.

**Roles**: director, manager, mentor, incubator

Get user details by ID

**Access**: Director only

Update user information

**Access**: Director only

Delete a user account

**Access**: Director only

Get comprehensive system analytics

**Access**: Director only

**Response includes:**
- Total teams, projects, users
- Project statistics
- Team performance metrics
- Recent activities

Generate comprehensive reports

**Access**: Director only

View all teams in the system

**Access**: Director only

View all projects across all teams

**Access**: Director only

View all mentors and their assignments

**Access**: Director only

View all inventory items and assignments

**Access**: Director only

Create system-wide announcements

**Access**: Director only

item.name: üöÄ INCUBATOR - TEAM OPERATIONS
item.description: Manage your team's projects, members, and resources. Complete your profile in phases to unlock full system features.

**Access**: Incubator (Team Leader)

View and manage your team members

**Access**: Incubator (Team Leader)

Add new members to your team

**Access**: Incubator (Team Leader)

**Note**: Password is auto-generated and sent via email.

- challenge_description: Description of the problem/challenge you're solving
